title: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations
descriptions:
**Introducing the Ultimate Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set!**

Get ready to deck the halls with our stunning Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, perfect for indoor and outdoor decorations. This magnificent set includes a 23.6-inch wreath and an 8.8-foot garland, adorned with:

Snowflake pine needle branches
Two types of pine cones
Berry clusters
Frosted branches

But that's not all! Our set features 100 warm LED lights, powered by 3 AA batteries (not included), with a convenient timer function that turns the lights on for 6 hours and off for 18 hours.

**What sets us apart:**

No assembly required - simply hang and enjoy!
Made with sturdy, high-quality materials that are hypoallergenic and fireproof.
Durable and long-lasting, with minimal maintenance required.
Suitable for a variety of locations, including walls, doors, fireplaces, living rooms, bedrooms, dining rooms, and windows.

**Peace of Mind:**

Enjoy a 365-day warranty and 24-hour customer service availability.

**Transform your home into a winter wonderland with our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set!** Order now and get ready to impress your friends and family with your festive decorations!

**Introducing the Ultimate Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set!**

Get ready to deck the halls with our stunning Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, designed to bring warmth and festive cheer to your home. This magnificent set features a beautiful 23.6-inch wreath and an impressive 8.8-foot garland, adorned with an array of lifelike components, including snowflake pine needle branches, two types of pine cones, berry clusters, and frosted branches.

**100 Warm LED Lights to Brighten Your Space**

Our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set is illuminated by 100 warm LED lights, powered by 3 AA batteries (not included). The convenient timer function allows you to enjoy 6 hours of twinkling lights, followed by 18 hours of rest.

**Durable, Hypoallergenic, and Fireproof Materials**

Crafted with sturdy, high-quality materials, our wreath and garland are designed to withstand the elements and ensure a safe, worry-free festive season. The hypoallergenic and fireproof pins provide added peace of mind.

**Easy to Use and Maintain**

No assembly required! Simply hang your wreath and garland in your desired location - perfect for walls, doors, fireplaces, or windows. With minimal maintenance and no need for watering, our set will remain vibrant and beautiful throughout the holiday season.

**Suitable for Indoor and Outdoor Use**

Enjoy the flexibility to decorate your home's interior or exterior with our versatile Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set. Whether you're looking to create a festive atmosphere in your living room, bedroom, or dining room, or want to add some holiday cheer to your outdoor spaces, our set has got you covered.

**Worry-Free Warranty and Customer Service**

We stand behind the quality of our product, offering a 365-day warranty and 24-hour customer service availability. If you have any questions or concerns, our dedicated team is always here to help.

**Order Your Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set Today!**

Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to elevate your holiday decor. Get ready to impress friends and family with our stunning Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set. Order now and start spreading holiday cheer!

**Get Ready to Deck the Halls with Our Stunning Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set!**

Add a touch of festive magic to your home with our luxurious Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set. This gorgeous set includes a 23.6-inch wreath and 8.8 feet of garland, perfectly designed to bring joy and cheer to your holiday season.

**Dazzling Details:**

* 100 warm LED lights to create a cozy ambiance
* Snowflake pine needle branches, 2 types of pine cones, berry clusters, and frosted branches for a realistic and lush look
* Sturdy, high-quality materials that are hypoallergenic and fireproof for a safe and worry-free experience
* No assembly required - just hang and enjoy!
* Suitable for both indoor and outdoor use, perfect for walls, doors, fireplaces, and more

**Convenience at Its Best:**

* Powered by 3 AA batteries (not included) with a convenient 6-hour timer function
* Minimal maintenance required - no watering or upkeep needed
* Never fades, ensuring your decorations remain vibrant and beautiful throughout the season

**Worry-Free Purchase:**

* Backed by a 365-day warranty for your peace of mind
* 24-hour customer service available to assist with any questions or concerns

Create a winter wonderland in your home with our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set. Order now and get ready to make this holiday season one to remember!
